dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: It looks Timangelise hasn't come out.

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Suicide pills, you say? How... disappointing.

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Are you sure there was no other route available?

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: Here's a hint: Don't go back to where you met Timangelise, there's a puzzle for you to solve.

dialogue.speaker: Head
dialogue.text: It is possible for both of you to live. Try again?
